title.narrative: QUALITY, INCLUSIVE AND RELEVANT EDUCATION

description.narrative: By 2022, the Ministry of Education and schools in selected areas will have the capacity to improve the learning, completion and inclusion of children with disabilities., which contributes to Access To Quality Learning Opportunities, Equitable Access To Quality Education, Learning, Skills, Participation And Engagement. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, Systems Strengthening To Leave No One Behind. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2022, children will have access to high-quality, relevant, inclusive integrated care services for early childhood and education services.

mailing-address.narrative: Avenida Anacaona No.9 Casa de Naciones Unidas 3er. piso Mirador Sur Santo Domingo

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By 2022, the Ministry of Education and schools in selected areas will have the capacity to improve the learning, completion andinclusion of children with disabilities.

description.narrative: The MoE and UNICEF signed an agreement regarding the scaling-up of the national policy to improve teaching /learning in the first three grades of primary education, starting in five (out of 18) prioritized educational regions. This advance comes after significant advocacy efforts, design, and validation.;;The National Strategy for the Culture of Peace achieved the participation of 117,000 adolescents from schools in educational region 10 in orientation and awareness activities for the prevention, detection and denunciation of early unions, recognizing them as a violation of human rights. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:13/01/2022
